languages.text: "Мой слуга доставляет из Прорвы мясо для их кровавых спектаклей. А я улучшаю его аугментами и стимуляторами, чтобы ведьмам было интересно убивать. А иногда я балую их более интересными противниками — биомашинами или чудовищами, созданными моим гением хирургии".

"My servant harvests meat in the Chasm and delivers it to their bloody performances. I improve it with augments and stimulants to make it interesting enough so the Wyches will enjoy killing it. Sometimes, I indulge them with little treats — biomachines or beasts moulded by my surgical genius."
languages.original_text: "Мой слуга доставляет из Прорвы мясо для их кровавых спектаклей. А я улучшаю его аугментами и стимуляторами, чтобы ведьмам было интересно убивать. А иногда я балую их более интересными противниками — биомашинами или чудовищами, созданными моим гением хирургии".

traits.locale_text: "My servant harvests meat in the Chasm and delivers it to their bloody performances. I improve it with augments and stimulants so that the Wyches may enjoy killing it. Sometimes I delight them with special treats — biomachines or beasts moulded by my surgical genius."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: « Mon serviteur récupère de la chair fraîche dans l'Abîme et la leur apporte pour qu'ils puissent se livrer à leurs performances sanglantes. Je me charge d'améliorer ces faibles individus avec des augmentations et des stimulants afin de rendre les combats plus intéressants pour les Cérastes. Parfois, j'essaie de varier leur ordinaire en leur proposant des biomachines ou des bêtes conçues dans mon génial Opéra. »
languages.original_text: "My servant harvests meat in the Chasm and delivers it to their bloody performances. I improve it with augments and stimulants to make it interesting enough so the Wyches will enjoy killing it. Sometimes, I indulge them with little treats — biomachines or beasts moulded by my surgical genius."

traits.locale_text: « Mon serviteur récupère de la chair fraîche dans l'Abîme et la leur apporte pour qu'ils puissent se livrer à leurs performances sanglantes. Je me charge d'améliorer ces faibles individus avec des augmentations et des stimulants afin de rendre les combats plus intéressants pour les Cérastes. Parfois, j'essaie de varier leur ordinaire en leur proposant des biomachines ou des bêtes conçues dans mon génial Opéra. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: “我的仆人会在裂隙中收集活畜，送到竞技场的血腥表演之中。我会用植入物与强化剂来改善肉质，让表演更加有趣，让巫灵教派的人杀得开心。有的时候，我还会给他们准备些小点心。那些生物机械与凶兽，都是靠着我无人能及的外科技术制造出来的。”
languages.original_text: "My servant harvests meat in the Chasm and delivers it to their bloody performances. I improve it with augments and stimulants to make it interesting enough so the Wyches will enjoy killing it. Sometimes, I indulge them with little treats — biomachines or beasts moulded by my surgical genius."

traits.locale_text: “我的仆人会在裂隙中收集活畜，送到竞技场的血腥表演之中。我会用植入物与强化剂来改善肉质，让表演更加有趣，让巫灵教派的人杀得开心。有的时候，我还会给他们准备些小点心。那些生物机械与凶兽，都是靠着我无人能及的外科技术制造出来的。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Mein Diener erntet in der Kluft Fleisch und bringt es zu ihren blutigen Aufführungen. Ich verbessere es durch Augmentationen und Stimulanzien, damit es ausreichend interessant ist und die Hekatari Spaß daran haben, es zu töten. Manchmal schenke ich ihnen kleine Besonderheiten — Biomaschinen oder Monster, die durch meine chirurgische Genialität entstanden sind."
languages.original_text: "My servant harvests meat in the Chasm and delivers it to their bloody performances. I improve it with augments and stimulants to make it interesting enough so the Wyches will enjoy killing it. Sometimes, I indulge them with little treats — biomachines or beasts moulded by my surgical genius."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Diener erntet in der Kluft Fleisch und bringt es zu ihren blutigen Aufführungen. Ich verbessere es durch Augmentationen und Stimulanzien, damit es ausreichend interessant ist und die Hekatari Spaß daran haben, es zu töten. Manchmal schenke ich ihnen kleine Besonderheiten — Biomaschinen oder Monster, die durch meine chirurgische Genialität entstanden sind."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: «Mi sirviente busca víctimas en el Abismo y se las lleva para que realicen sus sangrientos espectáculos. Las mejoro con aumentos y estimulantes para que las brujas disfruten más matándolas. A veces les envío pequeños regalos: biomáquinas o bestias fruto de mi genio quirúrgico».
languages.original_text: "My servant harvests meat in the Chasm and delivers it to their bloody performances. I improve it with augments and stimulants to make it interesting enough so the Wyches will enjoy killing it. Sometimes, I indulge them with little treats — biomachines or beasts moulded by my surgical genius."

traits.locale_text: «Mi sirviente busca víctimas en el Abismo y se las lleva para que realicen sus sangrientos espectáculos. Las mejoro con aumentos y estimulantes para que las brujas disfruten más matándolas. A veces les envío pequeños regalos: biomáquinas o bestias fruto de mi genio quirúrgico».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: 「私の従者が裂け目で肉を収穫し、彼らの血なまぐさいパフォーマンスにそれを届ける。私はオーグメントと興奮剤で肉を改良し、ウィッチたちが殺しを楽しめるよう助力する。時には、私の天才的な外科手術によって作られたバイオマシンや獣といった、ちょっとしたご馳走で彼らを甘やかすこともある」
languages.original_text: "My servant harvests meat in the Chasm and delivers it to their bloody performances. I improve it with augments and stimulants to make it interesting enough so the Wyches will enjoy killing it. Sometimes, I indulge them with little treats — biomachines or beasts moulded by my surgical genius."

traits.locale_text: 「私の従者が裂け目で肉を収穫し、彼らの血なまぐさいパフォーマンスにそれを届ける。私はオーグメントと興奮剤で肉を改良し、ウィッチたちが殺しを楽しめるよう助力する。時には、私の天才的な外科手術によって作られたバイオマシンや獣といった、ちょっとしたご馳走で彼らを甘やかすこともある」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: "Hizmetkârlarım Yarık'tan et toplar ve yapılan kanlı gösterilere teslim eder. Ben de toplanan etleri ogmentlerle ve uyarıcılarla geliştirir, Viçlerin öldürmekten keyif alacağı kadar ilginç hâle getiririm. Bazen onlara küçük birer armağan babında, cerrahi dehamla meydana gelmiş biyomakineler ve hayvanlar da gönderirim."
languages.original_text: "My servant harvests meat in the Chasm and delivers it to their bloody performances. I improve it with augments and stimulants to make it interesting enough so the Wyches will enjoy killing it. Sometimes, I indulge them with little treats — biomachines or beasts moulded by my surgical genius."

traits.locale_text: "Hizmetkârlarım Yarık'tan et toplar ve onların kanlı gösterilerine teslim eder. Ben de toplanan etleri ogmentlerle ve uyarıcılarla geliştirip, Viçlerin öldürmekten keyif alacağı kadar ilginç hâle getiririm. Bazen onlara küçük birer armağan babında, cerrahi dehamla meydana gelmiş biyomakineler ve hayvanlar da gönderirim."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
